column1: Meimei: An Efficient Probabilistic Approach for Semantically Annotating Tables
AAAI Technical Track: AI and the Web
Given a large amount of table data
column2: how can we find the tables that contain the contents we want? A naive search fails when the column names are ambiguous
column3: such as if columns containing stock price information are named “Close” in one table and named “P” in another table.
